author: genspring
msg: Somehow, once currentRolePatterns = new HashMap<String, URLPattern>(); is executed.currentPatterns will point to the same reference of currentRolePatterns.
Pull (currentPatterns ==null) out of the loop to avoid the unexpected logic caused by the problem above.
